## Dataset Description:

The *Stone Tools in Upper Norrland* dataset is a documentation that describes lithic artifacts from Norrbottens County in northern Sweden. It was created as part of a larger project which aims to catalog and make information available about stone tools in this region. The data was gathered through on-site surveys and available records.

**Identifer**: DOI [10.7910/DVN/OCYM7I](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/OCYM7I)
